name: Couch Taekwondo League
description:
A silly little local multiplayer fighting game with rules and moves loosely based on real taekwondo tournament sparring.

Guaranteed features to release within a month: up to 4-player support (working as of now but will take a mooment to implement switching number of players on the fly), lock-on/aim assist mode, flags over characters' heads to show which side they're on, some kind of hit sound/marker, and options menu

All assets in this game except for the background image on the main menu are created by me or default assets with Unreal Engine. The fighter models and animations and arena are fully made by me, but send me an email at ansharyan03@gmail.com if you'd like to use them in a project of your own, I'll be more than happy to see what you can come up with.
